trans-unit.target:
<var 48 08 /var><var 49 04 /var>The rules of engagement on the Bozjan southern front are different than what you will have encountered before. The following pages contain a detailed explanation of what you may expect on the battlefield.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
<var 48 0F /var>Read and understand them well if you would gain the upper hand over the Empire's IVth Legion.<var 48 01 /var>

<var 48 08 /var><var 49 04 /var>■Level Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Though it is possible to join the Bozjan southern front beginning at level 71, all players will be synced to level 80 while in duty. Item level will also be synced accordingly.
<var 48 0F /var>* All job actions unlocked through level 80 will also be available while in duty.<var 48 01 /var>

<var 48 08 /var><var 49 04 /var>■Resistance Rank<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
All players are subject to a separate leveling system while at the front, indicated by their “Resistance rank.” Performing admirably in large-scale battles such as skirmishes and critical engagements will increase your “mettle”─akin to experience points.
<var 48 0F /var>* Simply defeating imperial troops and beasts is not enough to prove your mettle─you must participate in successful military operations.<var 48 01 /var>

If you demonstrate sufficient mettle upon reporting to the Resistance commander, your Resistance rank will climb. Those of higher rank will gain access to more areas of the front, as well as additional quests.
<var 48 0F /var>* Your Resistance rank will not increase unless authorized by the commander, so don't forget to report for inspection!<var 48 01 /var>

<var 48 08 /var><var 49 04 /var>■Job Leveling<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Upon successful completion of a military operation, you will gain regular experience points in addition to mettle. This experience will be applied to your job level as normal, so it is recommended that you consider using a job that has not yet reached level 80 to take advantage of experience point gains.

<var 48 08 /var><var 49 04 /var>■But Wait...<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
More information is available from Sjeros in Gangos and your Resistance comrades at the southern front, so don't hesitate to converse with them!

<var 48 08 /var><var 49 04 /var>Duty Calls─A Dungeon Beckons!<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Enlist the aid of <var 48 0F /var>allied players<var 48 01 /var> and <var 48 0F /var>NPCs<var 48 01 /var> alike to slay monsters, solve mysteries, and defeat the mighty boss lurking in the depths. Conquering <var 48 0F /var>dungeons<var 48 01 /var> is not only a time-honored tradition of adventurers, but it also <var 48 0F /var>progresses the main scenario<var 48 01 /var> and tests your prowess at a given class or job in a <var 48 0F /var>timed environment<var 48 01 /var>.
Intimidated? Fear not, dear adventurer─for with a little guidance, you too shall be clearing <var 48 0F /var>dungeons<var 48 01 /var> with confidence in no time!

<var 48 08 /var><var 49 04 /var>Into the Depths: Two Ways to Adventure<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
You may challenge a <var 48 0F /var>dungeon<var 48 01 /var> via two different methods: by calling upon <var 48 0F /var>the support of trusty NPCs<var 48 01 /var>, or by <var 48 0F /var>pooling your talent with other players<var 48 01 /var>, be they best friend or first acquaintance. No matter how you form your party, the trials that await you will be comparable in difficulty and experience.

<var 48 08 /var><var 49 04 /var>Into the Depths: Duty Support<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
No matter how independent and capable you may be, a <var 48 0F /var>dungeon<var 48 01 /var> is too mighty a challenge to overcome on one's own. By choosing <var 48 0F /var>Duty Support<var 48 01 /var> when accessing the entrance of any applicable <var 48 0F /var>dungeon<var 48 01 /var>, you will summon a balanced <var 48 0F /var>team of skilled NPCs<var 48 01 /var> to support you on your path to glory. Just don't forget them once you're rich and famous, yes?

<var 48 08 /var><var 49 04 /var>Into the Depths: Duty Support, Continued<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
After choosing to challenge a <var 48 0F /var>dungeon<var 48 01 /var> with NPCs via <var 48 0F /var>Duty Support<var 48 01 /var>, a party that perfectly complements your <var 48 0F /var>current class or job<var 48 01 /var> will be automatically created for you. All that's left is to select <var 48 0F /var>Register for Duty<var 48 01 /var>, and you will be battling monsters in no time.

<var 48 08 /var><var 49 04 /var>Into the Depths: Duty Finder<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
They say a burden shared is a burden halved, and with the <var 48 0F /var>Duty Finder<var 48 01 /var> you can split that burden amongst a team of players who smolder with the same passion for <var 48 0F /var>adventure<var 48 01 /var> as you do! No need to recruit such teammates yourself─the <var 48 0F /var>Duty Finder<var 48 01 /var>'s matching system will automatically group players according to chosen challenge and other criteria, guaranteeing a balanced and invigorating cooperative experience for all.

<var 48 08 /var><var 49 04 /var>Into the Depths: Duty Finder, Continued<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Once you have been matched with a party, you will be notified by a <var 48 0F /var>bracing sound<var 48 01 /var> that the time for battle is at hand! Simply select <var 48 0F /var>Commence<var 48 01 /var>, and you and your comrades will be delivered unto the fray.
Remember─the adventurers with whom you are cooperating are fellow <var 48 0F /var>players<var 48 01 /var>. Take advantage of the full and varied strengths your group possesses by communicating respectfully and often.

<var 48 08 /var><var 49 04 /var>Dungeons Abound<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
As your journey progresses, more and more <var 48 0F /var>dungeons<var 48 01 /var> will become available, until you find yourself master of a sea of tribulations overcome. But don't let completion deter you from <var 48 0F /var>challenging your favorite duties again<var 48 01 /var>─simply open <var 48 0F /var>Duty Support<var 48 01 /var> to play through <var 48 0F /var>dungeons you've cleared<var 48 01 /var>, or use the <var 48 0F /var>Duty Finder<var 48 01 /var> to do the same with <var 48 0F /var>dungeons not yet supported by the NPC party system<var 48 01 /var>. No matter your craving, you're guaranteed to find an adventure to satisfy.

<var 48 08 /var><var 49 04 /var>Need a Refresher?<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
While this introduction of <var 48 0F /var>dungeons<var 48 01 /var> has no doubt been immortalized within the hallowed halls of your mind, if you find yourself in need of a refresher, you may <var 48 0F /var>access tutorial information<var 48 01 /var> again by selecting the <var 48 0F /var>?<var 48 01 /var> icon in the <var 48 0F /var>Duty Support<var 48 01 /var> or <var 48 0F /var>Duty Finder<var 48 01 /var> windows.
A true adventurer knows the meaning of duty─secure your legacy by fulfilling yours!

<var 48 08 /var><var 49 04 /var>Variant Dungeons─A Matter of Choice<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
<var 48 0F /var>Variant dungeons<var 48 01 /var> are a unique type of duty featuring <var 48 0F /var>branching paths<var 48 01 /var>. By exploring these choices alongside the quest character, you will gradually reveal new elements of the overarching story.
Unlocking certain branches may require some detective work! Whenever you complete a path, a new story entry will be added to the journal associated with the dungeon, so keep at it until you discover all the forks in the road.

<var 48 08 /var><var 49 04 /var>Make It a Party or Go It Alone<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
The difficulty of a variant dungeon is <var 48 0F /var>automatically adjusted<var 48 01 /var> to provide a challenge for parties of between one to four players.
You can group up with friends, make use of the party matching option, or put your solo player skills to the test. Victory will require effort and attention, but it is entirely possible to complete these dungeons alone.

<var 48 08 /var><var 49 04 /var>Variant Actions<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
To allow for greater freedom in role choices, variant dungeons grant players the use of special <var 48 0F /var>variant actions<var 48 01 /var>.
These actions mimic existing abilities such as <var 48 0F /var>Cure<var 48 01 /var> or <var 48 0F /var>Rampart<var 48 01 /var>, alleviating the need for dedicated tanks, DPS, or healers. Each player has two actions available for use during the dungeon, and these can be changed at any time in the Dungeon Finder window.

<var 48 08 /var><var 49 04 /var>Enter the Dungeon<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
You can enter a variant dungeon via the <var 48 0F /var>V&C Dungeon Finder window<var 48 01 /var>, which is accessed by speaking with the <var 48 0F /var>NPC at the dungeon entrance<var 48 01 /var>, or by selecting the option from <var 48 0F /var>Duty<var 48 01 /var> in the main menu.
This standalone window serves all your variant dungeon needs, whether you wish to read story discoveries, set your variant actions, or make changes to the dungeon settings.

<var 48 08 /var><var 49 04 /var>Welcome to your new home in the southern seas─your own personal island sanctuary!<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Explore the wilds, build landmarks, grow crops, tend to animals, and enjoy everything this slice of paradise has to offer.

<var 48 08 /var><var 49 04 /var>■No Class/Job Restrictions<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Adventurers of all inclinations can enjoy island sanctuary life, regardless of crafting or gathering experience. Come as you are!

<var 48 08 /var><var 49 04 /var>■Island EXP and Sanctuary Rank<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Accumulate island experience by engaging in activities on your island to increase your sanctuary rank. As your sanctuary rank increases, so too will the facets of island life available to you!

<var 48 08 /var><var 49 04 /var>■Visions<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Realize visions for your newfound sanctuary by following a series of simple steps, and life on your island will be nothing short of perfect before you know it!

<var 48 08 /var><var 49 04 /var>You now have access to the Hall of the Novice!<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Designed especially for your chosen role, these solo exercises will teach you the ins and outs of party combat. You may access them at any time, either by selecting Hall of the Novice from the Duty section of the main menu, or by speaking with any of the Smiths found in Adventurers' Guilds across Eorzea.
Complete these exercises to receive a set of gear that will aid you on your journey!

<var 48 08 /var><var 49 04 /var>New exercises have been added to the Hall of the Novice!<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
These solo challenges will teach you how to interpret the attack markers seen during combat. You may access them at any time, either by selecting Hall of the Novice from the Duty section of the main menu, or by speaking with any of the Smiths found in Adventurers' Guilds across Eorzea.
Complete these exercises and arm yourself with the knowledge required to conquer the many challenges that await you on your journey!

<var 48 08 /var><var 49 04 /var>You stand upon the Occult Crescent, an uncharted isle in the heart of Shades' Triangle<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Whether you choose to join your fellow explorers in large-scale battles against the fiercest of foes, or take on the crescent's denizens in a series of small skirmishes, there are many ways to proceed and much to uncover on these shores.
The following pages contain a detailed explanation of what you may expect on the Occult Crescent. Read and understand them well if you would seek to unravel the island's mysteries.

<var 48 08 /var><var 49 04 /var>■Level Requirements<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
The Occult Crescent is accessible for <var 48 0F /var>Disciples of War or Magic level 100 and above.<var 48 01 /var> <var 48 0F /var>Item level will be synced to 700.<var 48 01 /var> Players may change to a different job of sufficient level while in duty.

<var 48 08 /var><var 49 04 /var>■Knowledge is Power!<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
All players are subject to a separate leveling system while exploring the Occult Crescent, indicated by their <var 48 0F /var>knowledge level<var 48 01 /var>. Participating in large-scale battles or slaying the island's fiends will bolster your <var 48 0F /var>knowledge<var 48 01 /var>─akin to experience points.

<var 48 08 /var><var 49 04 /var>■Knowledge is Power!<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
When facing the fiends of the Occult Crescent, your knowledge level will significantly impact the outcome of any battle. To improve your chances of survival when roaming the wilds, be sure to accrue as much knowledge as you are able.
Discrepancies between your knowledge level and that of your foes will affect the damage you deal and receive. You would be well to choose your marks carefully before engaging.

<var 48 08 /var><var 49 04 /var>■大規模戦闘に参加してみよう！<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
島内では、「<var 48 0F /var>クリティカルエンカウント<var 48 01 /var>」と呼ばれる、 最大72人での大規模戦闘が発生することがあります。 見事攻略することができれば、大量の「知見」など様々な報酬を得られます。 クリティカルエンカウントはナレッジレベルの影響を受けないため、積極的に参加してみましょう！
なお、島内ではデジョンのアクションが専用の<var 48 0F /var>デミデジョン<var 48 01 /var>へと変わり リキャストタイムを気にせず拠点に戻ることができます。

<var 48 08 /var><var 49 04 /var>Welcome to the Cosmic Exploration Initiative!<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
As part of the team, you will work alongside <var 48 0F /var>fellow residents of your Home World<var 48 01 /var> to explore and develop Sinus Ardorum as well as each new planet you reach.
Further each objective through crafting and gathering, and shape your surroundings with new facilities designed to aid in greater exploration!

<var 48 08 /var><var 49 04 /var>■Class Restrictions and Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Only Disciples of the Hand or Land may take part in cosmic exploration. Some activities employ <var 48 0F /var>quest sync<var 48 01 /var>, which adjusts the difficulty and EXP rewards to your current level.

<var 48 08 /var><var 49 04 /var>■探索フィールドの特殊ルール<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
宇宙開拓フィールドでは、セントラルクリスタルの力により、 クラフター・ギャザラーの「スプリント」が「コスモスプリント」に変化し、 速度と効果時間が強化されます。
また探索フィールドでは、通常時はマウント騎乗ができません。 ただし、大型ローダーによる開拓指令「<var 48 0F /var>メカオペレーション<var 48 01 /var>」が発令された場合は、 パイロットに選抜された少数のプレイヤーのみ、専用のマウントに乗って指令に参加する事ができます。

<var 48 08 /var><var 49 04 /var>■Check Your Exotablet<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
In addition to mech ops, cosmic exploration offers a variety of other activities. Should you need more information, refer to your <var 48 0F /var>exotablet<var 48 01 /var> and open the <var 48 0F /var>Exploration Guide<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to learn more!

<var 48 08 /var><var 49 04 /var>■探索フィールドへの入場<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
嘆きの海(X:21.9 Y:13.2）にいるNPC「ドライビングウェイ」に話しかけることで、 探索フィールド「焦がれの入江」に入ることができます。
また、焦がれの入江は、混雑時には複数のインスタンスエリアが生成される事があります。
インスタンスエリア間を移動したい場合は、焦がれの入り江(X:20.3 Y:20.0）にいる、 NPC「ドライビングウェイ」に話しかけることで、任意のインスタンスへ移動できます。
